code: import React from"react";import ReactDOM from"react-dom";import App from"./App";import store from"./redux/store";import{Provider}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ReactDOM.render(/*#__PURE__*/ /** 此处需要用Provider包裹App,目的是让App所有的后代容器组件都能接送到store*/_jsx(Provider,{store:store,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(App,{})}),document.getElementById("root"));
